name: FishImplementationGuide
title: Fish Implementation Guide
description: An example of how FSH can be used to create an IG about fish

resource.name: Fish Patient
resource.description: A patient that is a type of fish.

resource.name: HIV MedicationStatement - ART
resource.description: A summary of the ART medication being taken by an HIV patient

resource.name: HIV Patient
resource.description: A patient that may be diagnosed with HIV, may have a viral load lab, and may be virally suppressed.

resource.name: Veterinarian
resource.description: A profile on the Practitioner resource for veterinarians. In the US, vets do not have National Provider Numbers.

resource.name: ART Start Type
resource.description: Whether the client is ART naive or is restarting ART

resource.name: Estimated Age
resource.description: Estimated Age of Patient if date of birth is unavailable

resource.name: ART Start Type values
resource.description: Codes describing whether the client is ART naive or is restarting ART

resource.name: Fish Species Value Set
resource.description: Codes describing various species of fish, taken from SNOMED-CT.

resource.name: HIV Extended Codes
resource.description: Codes defined only in this Implementation Guide and require mapping to a standard semantic terminology.
